EmailTemplate.name: 2016Q3.Global.NUR.1739.Airscale.Email 8 - On-demand Cloud RAN Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Get a head-start on your cloud-based 5G-ready network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Expert insight: How to build a multi-layer, cloud-based radio network- new white paper available AirScale Radio Access Five big questions about migrating to
multi-layer Cloud RAN - Why won’t today’s networks meet 5G demands? - Why to divide baseband processing? - Key benefits of multi-layer Cloud RAN architecture? - What is a good site strategy for future network architectures? - What can be done today to prepare for 5G and gain immediate business benefits?
A top Nokia radio architecture expert gives the answers in this technology-oriented webinar. Watch the webinar <[[https://na-sjl.marketo.com/lp/nokia2/1756.Multi-layeredandcloud-based-theradionetworkfor5G.html]]> © 2016 Nokia.
